entry.title: I Choose You
entry.content: Place two Pokemon cards next to each other. I Choose You will identify the Pokemon and spawn in two AR Pokemon, with stats and attack moves. Command your Pokemon with voice commands such as “Squirtle, use water gun!”
entry.summary: Place two Pokemon cards next to each other. I Choose You will identify the Pokemon and spawn in two AR Pokemon, with stats and attack moves. Command your Pokemon with voice commands such as “Squirtle, use water gun!”

entry.title: Platformy
entry.content: A simple 2d platformer, with an emphasis on multi-platform support. Multiplayer handled using web sockets.
entry.summary: A simple 2d platformer, with an emphasis on multi-platform support. Multiplayer handled using web sockets.

entry.title: mysoil.space
entry.content: Social media, for community gardens. Track your plants and see what other people are growing. Using the Microsoft Weather API and our Arduino sensor that detects soil moisture, set a watering schedule and set other tasks for community garden members.
entry.summary: Social media, for community gardens. Track your plants and see what other people are growing. Using the Microsoft Weather API and our Arduino sensor that detects soil moisture, set a watering schedule and set other tasks for community garden members.

entry.title: ShoutGamers
entry.content: Using automation to help the gaming community connect with one another. Automatically share relevant gaming tweets to over 169k followers. Utilize Redis database and keyword filter system to combat spam.
entry.summary: Using automation to help the gaming community connect with one another. Automatically share relevant gaming tweets to over 169k followers. Utilize Redis database and keyword filter system to combat spam.

entry.title: ShoutGamers.ttv
entry.content: Chatbot and custom chat commands to assist and automate growth on Twitch. Incentivized and gamified channel exploration to solve the toughest aspect of livestreaming: discovery. 5.8k followers.
entry.summary: Chatbot and custom chat commands to assist and automate growth on Twitch. Incentivized and gamified channel exploration to solve the toughest aspect of livestreaming: discovery. 5.8k followers.

entry.title: Request RT
entry.content: Potentially TOS breaking app that automates microtransactions for Twitter influencers to sell actions such as retweets, tweets, shoutouts, and follows.
entry.summary: Potentially TOS breaking app that automates microtransactions for Twitter influencers to sell actions such as retweets, tweets, shoutouts, and follows.
